CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 6, 1972, pg. 6 reads: "NAACP Dinner Scenes - Some of the principal figures who participated on the program at the 18th annual NAACP Dinner at the Hilton Hotel Thursday. Left photo, seated, left to right, Mal Goode, ABC Broadcasting network, Common Please [sic] Judge Thomas A. Harper and State Rep. K. Leroy Irvis.  Standing is Atty. Byrd R. Brown, president of the Pittsburgh Branch NAACP and the dinner speaker...Harris Photo
TitMainTitle: Mal Goode, Attorney Thomas Harper, and K. Leroy Irvis seated at banquet table, with Byrd Brown standing over them, for 18th annual NAACP Dinner, Hilton Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Irvis, K. Leroy, 1919-Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown, Byrd, 1929-Goode, Mal, 1908-1995.Banquets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Hilton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
